<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_820118_lms.lmsTypeAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>When the leave type is changed the accrued, duration, balance and taken fields should changed</description><name>lmsTypeAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var lmsTypeAjax = Class.create();
lmsTypeAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getDateDiff: function() //taking the date diff so we have added the function 
    {
        var d1 = new GlideDate();
        d1.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_start'));
        var d2 = new GlideDate();
        d2.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_end'));

        var duartion = GlideDate.subtract(d1, d2);
        return duartion.getNumericValue();
    },
	
	getLeaveBucket: function()
	{
		var gr = new GlideRecord('x_820118_lms_leave_bucket');
		gr.addQuery('employee',this.getParameter('sysparm_user'));
		gr.addQuery('leave_type',this.getParameter('sysparm_leavetype'));
		gr.query();
		if(gr.next())
			{
				var leaveDetails = {};
				leaveDetails.accrued = '' + gr.accrued;
				leaveDetails.balance = '' + gr.balance;
				leaveDetails.taken = '' + gr.taken;
				return JSON.stringify(leaveDetails); // to converting into string and sending the details to fields we ahve used the JSON object
			}
		
		
	},

    type: 'lmsTypeAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-13 11:05:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>70c4d0e72f2c9110e3f1d0e62799b682</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>lmsTypeAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_820118_lms">4c24a31b2f689110e3f1d0e62799b683</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">4c24a31b2f689110e3f1d0e62799b683</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_70c4d0e72f2c9110e3f1d0e62799b682</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-13 12:03:06</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
